posts.subject: Perhaps a ZN Blocklist might be an idea?
posts.body:
A while ago ZeroNet made a blocklist plugin that might be what you guys are using text dumps for.

You can get more info here, maybe the Board Owner can create a block list. Since everyone needs to create a zeroid this should work good.

More info here if you're interested.
http://127.0.0.1:43110/Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post:131

It wouldn't be too far off adding the json strings like it is now. But yeah, would knock them off everything on ZN, i guess if its a CP list or something that would be okay, but if its just people spamming not so much.
